title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Standards in Public Office
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Standards in Public Office 
Commission) (Designation) Order 2021. 

(2) The Standards in Public Office Commission is, for the purposes of 
section 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2020 (No. 13 of 2020), designated and may hold hearings before it by remote 
hearing. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 April, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [189] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
